input.sentences: the investment 500 group met to discuss the upcoming year .
the ceo was a quirky dude and made everyone cake .
he then asked them about their thought on the new year .
then he lightened the mood by doing a organization organization impression .
output.sentences: The team gathered to celebrate their accomplishments.
The CEO presented the award to the manager.
The CEO took extra time to thank each member of the team.
The CEO was so proud of the team.
Each member of the team felt at home and was often giggling through the celebration.
